sentences.en: 'Very much.'He said it with an involuntary shudder.
sentences.cn: “ 很害怕, ” 他说时不自觉地发起抖来.

sentences.en: An involuntary cry had broken out of him.

sentences.cn: 不由自主的痛苦的喊叫

sentences.en: An involuntary shudder passed over both of us.
sentences.cn: 我们两人都情不自禁地打了个寒颤.

sentences.en: Another surge of pain in my ankle caused me to give an involuntary shudder.
sentences.cn: 脚踝突然又一阵疼痛，痛得我直打哆嗦。
他不由自主地笑了一下.

sentences.en: He noticed her involuntary gesture, and smiled.
sentences.cn: 他注意到她那不由自主的姿势, 微微一笑.

sentences.en: Involuntary manslaughter can be based on criminal negligence.
sentences.cn: 非故意非预谋杀人罪可基于过失犯罪而成立.

sentences.en: Involuntary repatriation of Haitians began this week.
sentences.cn: 这周已开始将海地人强制遣送回国。

sentences.en: Involuntary terminations must be reported concurrent with the termination.
sentences.cn: 偶然终止必须告知发生终止的事件.

sentences.en: Love is capricious and involuntary ; reason can't direct its choice.
sentences.cn: 爱情是反复无常、然而然的,毫无道理可讲.

sentences.en: She shrank back with an involuntary gasp.
sentences.cn: 她不由得倒抽了口冷气，往后退了退。

sentences.en: The autonomic nervous system is also called the visceral, vegetative, or involuntary nervous system.
sentences.cn: 自主神经系统又称内脏神经系统, 营养神经系统或不随意神经系统.

sentences.en: The drug's side-effects can include involuntary defecation.
sentences.cn: 该药的副作用可能包括排便失禁。

sentences.en: They were like the involuntary movements of his own heart and blood.
sentences.cn: 他们就象是他自己的心脏和血液在自然地运动一般.

sentences.en: When Willie tapped on the window, Miguel gave an involuntary jump.
sentences.cn: 威利敲了敲窗户，米格尔不由自主地跳了起来。

words.tran_cn: 无心地；不自觉地；偶然地

trans.tran_cn: 无意识做出的，非故意的，非自愿的，不随意的，不由自主的
trans.tran_en: an involuntary movement, sound, reaction etc is one that you make suddenly and without intending to because you cannot control yourself
